author: Xbox
description:
Plunge into the endlessly shifting, ink-drenched corridors of Joey Drew Studios, hunting for supplies and weapons in a world of lurking horrors and dark secrets. Battle twisted cartoon monsters from the Dark Puddles using traps and precise strikes, while evading the Ink Demon in a relentless game of cat-and-mouse survival.

Bendy: Lone Wolf is available for pre-order now on Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/bendy-lone-wolf/9nc1pnsvwp55

author: Xbox
description:
Labyrinthine Console Edition — the acclaimed co-op horror experience — launches on Xbox with full cross-platform multiplayer support on September 18, 2025.

🎮 Pre-order now to get the Xbox-exclusive Labyrinthine – Werewolf Deluxe Edition, available only during the pre-order period — all at the price of the standard edition.

Includes:
Labyrinthine Console Edition – base game, standard edition

Werewolf Costume Pre-order Set – Werewolf costume and a unique green nameplate (exclusive to Xbox pre-orders)

Monster Costumes Pre-order Set – Wendigo and Witch Doctor costumes (not available separately for at least one year after console launch)

Supporter Pack – cosmetics, glowstick colors, orange nameplate, and music tracks

Early Access – play 7 days before launch, starting September 11, 2025

🔗 Learn more:
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/0/9P50QH4CB69C

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

author: Xbox
description:
The wait is over. Shadow Labyrinth, the 2D action platformer and genre-twisting alternate take on the iconic PAC-MAN has finally arrived. Awaken as Swordsman No.8 and team up with PUCK to explore a vast and mysterious planet, do battle with evolved monstrosities, and devour all who oppose you. 

Don’t fear the darkness, consume it.

author: Xbox
description:
Back to the Dawn is OUT NOW, Play it today on Xbox! 

Thrown behind bars with the city’s worst, you must survive, craft your escape plan, and fight for justice. Whether you were framed or sent in with a mission, every choice matters. Build trust, manipulate the scene, and decide the fate of the city from the shadows.

description:
With over 40 vehicles, 70+ gadgets, and 100+ vehicle parts & decals, there are thousands of ways to customize and tune your vehicle. Show off your style, build the ultimate racing machine, and race for first with a packed roster of racers and vehicles!
